buildInPublic.title: Building in Public
buildInPublic.subtitle: Sharing the development journey of Manifest369
buildInPublic.content: I believe in the power of transparency and community. Here, I share the development process of Manifest369, challenges encountered, lessons learned, and improvements driven by user feedback.

founderStory.title: Founder Story
founderStory.subtitle: From Developer to Manifestation Practitioner
founderStory.content: As a software engineer, I was initially skeptical about manifestation methods. But after personally practicing the 369 method and seeing significant results, I decided to combine technology with spiritual growth to create this app.
